[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1503345026539{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]Doctors’ Hospital Sseguku laboratory is a 24 hours diagnostic Medical laboratory that produces accurate diagnostic results, carries out prognostic tests and participates in medical research. The laboratory offers a wide range of routine and specialized tests, with fast turn around time which is achieved by an adequate number of experienced laboratory personnel present per duty shift.
We ensure that accurate and quality results are achieved by routine internal quality controls and external quality controls performed on all tests done.
The medical personnel exercise maximum professionalism in accordance with medical laboratory ethics and code of conduct.
The laboratory is also a referral site for many other laboratories issuing quality diagnostic results, hence promoting health care nationwide.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_cta text="LABORATORY SERVICES" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" align="center" heading_sep="yes" tag="h2" h2="LABORATORY SERVICES" txt_align="center" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""][/vc_cta]
[vc_custom_heading text=”List of Test done” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

  • HIV 1/2 Antibody test
  • HIV Viral load
  • HIV PCR
  • CD4, CDB Count
  • Random and fasting Bload Sugar
  • Stool examination
  • Urinalysis

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]Coagulation tests.

  • Bleeding and clotting time
  • Pathrombin time PT and INR
  • Partial thrombo plastin time(PTT/ aPTT)
  • D.Dimes

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]Other tests

  • Serum Crag
  • Gene Xpert
  • PAP Smear
  • Histology and histopathology
  • Fertility Test

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]Tumor Markers

  • PSA(prostate specific Antigen)
  • AFP (Alpha Feto protein)
  • CEA (Careino embryonic Antigen)
  • CA 125(Ovarian Cancer)
  • CA 19-9 (Pancreatic cancer)
  • CA 15-3 (Breast Cancer)
